title: Gorgeous Victorian Top floor 2 bdrm  9/1/22
posting_body: This Gorgeous Victorian Home is owner occupied!
Available Sep 1, 2022
Our home is located in a safe neighborhood in JP.
less than 5 minute walk to the Orange Line Stony Brook T Stop.
Walking distance to the Brewery on Amory, Wholefoods market, restaurants & shops & JP pond all walking distance.
The Southwest corridor bike path to downtown Boston right next to  house!
This top floor flat is 800SF,
total of (4) rooms.
Eat in kitchen living room 1 large bdrm 1 smaller bdrm, large pantry off kitchen and a very large storage closet off the back hallway.
The flat offers tons of stain glass the kitchen and bathroom were completely gutted and renovated 10 years ago.
No utilities are included in rent except water, your responsible to pay gas heat&hot water.
There is a coin-op washer&dryer located in the basement of the home for tenant use.
Absolutely No pets allowed.
NO smoking in or around the property.
No roommate shares allowed.
This is perfect for couples.
(Landlord runs credit check.)
There is a $50 per applicate fee to check credit.
If you are accepted as a tenant you will be required to pay 1st, last and, 1 mo.
security.
If interested I will only discuss details on the phone please text me so we can speak on phone.
I will NOT discuss any details through email!
Call Louis
